name: AVG Internet Security Temporary File
summary: Learn about .T$M files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: T$M files should be deleted automatically by AVG software. However, some versions of the Internet Security program do not delete the files, which is why they show up on the hard disk. If the T$M files do not contain any important data, they can be manually deleted to free up disk space.

description: Temporary file generated during a security scan performed with AVG anti-virus software; created when the program scan detects a locked or corrupted file and saves a copy of it in the \​Windows\​Temp\​ directory.
